availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Harrison P. Middleton (Lincoln County, KY, sheriff and farmer )

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, sheriff and farmer. Married to Emma Hansford Middleton. Father of Henry Middleton, John Middleton, Sue Middleton, Thomas Middleton, and Mary Middleton. Farmer in Lincoln County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Lincoln County in 1860. Sheriff in Lincoln County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, District 2, p. 306A.
